overview: With more than ten years of experience in software developing, Ariel knew how to use the power of Flash to create Flare3D, a new and innovative 3D engine that allows to make 3D apps over Flash platform. Currently, Flare3D is considered one of the best choices to generate 3D applications for WEB and mobile devices around the world. At this moment works as CTO in Flare3D and distributes his free time between his three major passions: code, music and COD4.
